00018 
00019 #include "SpTimer.h"
00020 
00021 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 
00023 #ifdef __APPLE__
00024 #include <ctime>
00025 #endif
00026 #ifdef WIN32
00027 #include <ctime>
00028 #include <windows.h>
00029 #else
00030 #include <sys/time.h>
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 
00035 using namespace Spark;
00036 
00037 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 unsigned int SpTimer::s_uiSecondsFrequency = 0;
00039 unsigned int SpTimer::s_uiMillisecondsFrequency = 0;
00040 float SpTimer::s_fInvSecFrequency = 0.0f;
00041 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 SpTimer::SpTimer():
00043     m_uiElapsedCount(0),
00044     m_eState(SpTimer::TS_OFF)
00045 {
00046     setupTimerFrequency();
00047     reset();
00048 }
00049 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 void SpTimer::setupTimerFrequency()
00051 {
00052     if (!s_uiSecondsFrequency)
00053     {
00054 
00055 #ifdef WIN32
00056         LARGE_INTEGER iFrequency;
00057         QueryPerformanceFrequency(&iFrequency);
00058 
00059         s_uiSecondsFrequency = iFrequency.LowPart;
00060         s_uiMillisecondsFrequency = iFrequency.LowPart/1000;
00061 #else
00062         struct timeval kFrequency;
00063         struct timezone kTZ;
00064 
00065         gettimeofday(&kFrequency, &kTZ);
00066         s_uiSecondsFrequency = 1000000;
00067         s_uiMillisecondsFrequency = 1000;
00068 #endif
00069 
00070         s_fInvSecFrequency = 1.0f/(float)s_uiSecondsFrequency;
00071     }
00072 }
00073 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 unsigned int SpTimer::samplePerformanceCounter()
00075 {
00076 
00077 #ifdef WIN32
00078         LARGE_INTEGER iSample;
00079         QueryPerformanceCounter(&iSample);
00080         return iSample.LowPart;
00081 #else
00082         struct timeval kSample;
00083         struct timezone kTZ;
00084 
00085         gettimeofday(&kSample, &kTZ);
00086         return kSample.tv_sec * 1000000 + kSample.tv_usec;
00087 #endif
00088 }
00089 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
